title: Locum O&G Registrar
summary: Convenient location, great hourly rate... the ideal short term O&G Registrar locum job!
bulletPoints: Day shifts 27 March - 2 April 2023 (plus on call & weekend)
description:
Are you an experienced O&G Registrar available for locum work this month?

Catalyst Medical Recruitment is working with a hospital in Canberra to find a safe, reliable O&G Registrar to cover night shifts at this modern city hospital.

About the Role:
  • Day shifts 0730-1600 plus on call and weekend shifts 0730-2000
  • $180 per hour worked (inclusive of super, salary packaging available)
  • Accommodation and return travel reimbursed

About You:
  • Experience working as an O&G Registrar
  • Current general registration with AHPRA
  • Willingness to travel away from home to Canberra

Interested to know more? Let’s talk! 
Click Apply or call Ian at Catalyst Medical Recruitment on 0477 258 704.

Catalyst Medical Recruitment is a specialist agency that connects doctors with locum and permanent job opportunities across Australia. We look forward to talking to you.

screening.question: Do you currently hold unconditional registration with AHPRA?
